channel.title: Annoying Error
channel.description:
[code]client.java:14491: illegal start of expression private boolean packetProcess() { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
[b]Help would be appreciated.[/b]

item.title: Annoying Error
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

The code I added was to completely remove range that I made and you can leech it if you want guys lol:

I added: public void Rnot() { sendMessage("Ranging is not allowed."); }
on top of public boolean process() and [code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837 == true)
{
Rnot();
playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1;
disconnected = true;
}
